quote: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
You do not find the happy life. You make it.
It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
You do not find the happy life. You make it.
The most wasted of days is one without laughter.
Stay close to anything that makes you glad you are alive.
Make each day your masterpiece.
Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
Life changes very quickly, in a very positive way, if you let it.
Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.
Impossible is for the unwilling.
No pressure, no diamonds.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
It is never too late to be what you might have been.
When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
Stay foolish to stay sane.
Stay hungry. Stay foolish.
Whatever you are, be a good one.
You must do the things you think you cannot do.
Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
Be faithful to that which exists within yourself.
Dream big and dare to fail.
My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive.
You are enough just as you are.
To be the best, you must be able to handle the worst.
No matter what you're going through, there's a light at the end of the tunnel.
Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
Every moment is a fresh beginning.
No guts, no story.
Keep going. Be all in.
Leave no stone unturned.
Nothing is impossible. The word itself says I'm possible!
It isn't where you came from. It's where you're going that counts.
If it matters to you, you'll find a way.
Tough times never last, but tough people do.
Turn your wounds into wisdom.
The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
If you're going through hell, keep going.
Don't wait, the time will never be just right.
If I cannot do great things, I can do small things in a great way.
Life is fragile. We're not guaranteed a tomorrow so give it everything you've got.
The bad news is time flies. The good news is you're the pilot.
Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
Some people look for a beautiful place. Others make a place beautiful.
Never let your sense of morals prevent you from doing what is right.
Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
We have a responsibility to help those around us and help others in need.
No one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of others.
No one has ever become poor by giving.
Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
The only thing that can grow is the thing you give energy to.
Good things happen to those who hustle.
No greater gift there is, than a generous heart.
Solitary trees, if they grow at all, grow strong.
A hero is someone who has given his or her life to something bigger than oneself.
You can if you think you can.
Worrying is like paying a debt you don't owe.
The wisest mind has something yet to learn.
Get to the point where you get allergic to average! You don't think average!
Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
It's no use going back to yesterday because I was a different person then.
You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.
I'd rather be hated for who I am than loved for who I am not.
We can do anything we want to if we stick to it long enough.
Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
I don't think of all the misery, but of the beauty that still remains.
In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
If you don't like the road you're walking, start paving another one.
Persistence guarantees that results are inevitable.
Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
Dwell on the beauty of life. Watch the stars, and see yourself running with them.
Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.
There is no saint without a past, no sinner without a future.
Always do what you are afraid to do.
Every noble work is at first impossible.
If you can dream it, you can do it.
Defeat may serve as well as victory to shake the soul and let the glory out.
Rise above the storm and you will find the sunshine.
Do what you feel in your heart to be right for you'll be criticized anyway.
Mastering others is strength. Mastering yourself is true power.
Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
The bird a nest, the spider a web, man friendship.
When one door of happiness closes, another opens.
The question is not what you look at, but what you see.
It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves.
Begin anywhere.
Have faith in yourself and in the future.
Despite the forecast, live like it's spring.
Do it Now!
The best way to prepare for life is to begin to live.
No great thing is created suddenly.
And in the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It is the life in your years.
Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
Life can only be understood backwards, but it must be lived forward.
Man doesn't know what he is capable of until he is asked.
Courage is fear that has said its prayers.
Life is as easy or as hard as you think it is.
Live your dreams.
The true vocation of man is to find his way for himself.
A life of sacrifice is the pinnacle of art, and is full of true joy.
No wind favors he who has no destined port.
It's not what you look at that matters, it's what you see.
Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
To know oneself, one should assert oneself.
Men do less than they ought unless they do all they can.
People living deeply have no fear of death.
A clever man commits no minor blunders.
Be not afraid of going slowly, be afraid only of standing still.
If I'm gonna tell a real story, I'm gonna start with my name.
Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
All limitations are selfimposed.
When you make a choice, you change the future.
Determine your priorities and focus on them.
Words are your paintbrush, and your life is the canvas. You can paint whatever you want to paint.
Trees that are slow to grow bear the best fruit.
Luck is a matter of preparation meeting opportunity.
Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
Be sure what you want and be sure about yourself.
If you tell the truth you don't have to remember anything.
Reexamine all you have been told. Dismiss what insults your soul.
Have enough courage to start and enough heart to finish.
With our thoughts, we make the world.
Be so good they can't ignore you.
If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
Don't you know your imperfections is a blessing?
Who you are tomorrow begins with what you do today.
Happiness depends upon ourselves.
You can't have everything. Where would you put it?
Tough times never last but tough people do.
Magic always happens when you direct your inner powers to the object you want to change.
I could agree with you but then we'd both be wrong.
The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
Yesterday you said tomorrow. Just do it.
Those at the top of the mountain didn't fall there.
There is no substitute for hard work.
Mostly, the world sees you the way you see yourself.
The meaning of life is to give life meaning.
The elevator to success is out of order. You'll have to use the stairs, one step at a time.
Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
We accept the love we think we deserve.
Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.
We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
Everything you can imagine is real.
Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting.
May you live every day of your life.
Life is too short to waste your time on people who don't respect, appreciate, and value you.
Two wrongs don't make a right, but they make a good excuse.
When in doubt, throw doubt out and have a little faith….
Don't worry about the challenges. Get excited about the rewards of crushing them.
Keep going. Is not as difficult as you feel it is. Don't give up.
I may stumble. I may fall. I may cry. But I'll NEVER give up! Tomorrow, I rise again. Steve Maraboli
If my life is going to mean anything, I have to live it myself.
Keep going like there's a big rock rolling behind you. Never stop until you find ways to dodge it!
There are a thousand reasons to live this life, every one of them is sufficient.
If beautiful lilies bloom in ugly waters, you too can blossom in ugly situations.
Concern yourself not with what you tried and failed in, but with what is still possible to do.
Isn't it nice to think that tomorrow is a new day with no mistakes in it yet?
Even a mistake may turn out to be the one thing necessary to a worthwhile achievement.
Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.
Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
Dream big, stay positive, work hard, and enjoy the journey.
Nothing is impossible to a willing heart.
Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
Don't get so busy making a living that you forget to make a life.
As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
My life is my message.
Nothing can dim the light which shines from within.
Never regret anything that made you smile.
You receive from the world what you give to the world.
Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
All progress takes place outside of your comfort zone.
It always seems impossible until it's done.
None but ourselves can free our minds.
I don't need it to be easy, I need it to be worth it.
In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
He that can have patience can have what he will.
Life becomes easier and more beautiful when we can see the good in other people.
Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
It's not whether you get knocked down; it's whether you get up.
The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing.
Surround yourself with only people who are going to lift you higher.
As we are liberated from our own fear, our presence automatically liberates others.
Keep your face always toward the sunshine, and shadows will fall behind you.
There is nothing impossible to they who will try.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
You define your own life. Don't let other people write your script.
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
Spread love everywhere you go.
You can be everything. You can be the infinite amount of things that people are.
Belief creates the actual fact.
